software.description:
The shared MATLAB codes contains:
1-Preprocessing Step including: Extraction of DWIs from Dicom images, calculation of tensor and diffusion maps, seed insertion or ROI depiction utility, MATLAB toolbox and instruction for segmentation of brain structures.
2-Uncertainty Analysis of hippocampal volume, FLAIR intensity, and MD; and cingulate and forniceal FA, for Lateralization of temporal lobe epilepsy.
3-DTI-based Response-Driven Modeling of mTLE Laterality using FA in Cingulum, Fornix, and Corpus Callosum.
Please cite the related articles for using the segmentation of Cingulum, Fornix, and Corpus Callosum, uncertainty analysis or DTI-based TLE modeling MATLAB code and its relevant image modalities (DTI, T1, and FLAIR).
